review:
I just moved to Delhi from Bangalore and before I moved had a few cavities filled. I was having ton of problems with the previous fillings so I needed to find a dentist! I have terrible anxiety and even more so when it comes to dentists so I was apprehensive about which dentist to go too. Luckily I found Dr Ruchi Gupta. She is so nice and helpful. I got an appointment the day I called in and rectified all my problems very well.

I am highly satisfied with the outcome of teeth whitening also and have already recommended it to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello all my friends 
I had a fall from stairs and my front teeth was broken.
I searched Practo for Dentist in Pitampura and found good reviews for Dr Ruchi Gupta.
She was very friendly and explained all the treatment options to me and did laser filling in my teeth. 
She did it with very precisely and there was no pain at all.
She also cleaned my dental stains which were there since I am very fond of coffee.
I am highly grateful to her for fixing my teeth and giving me my smile back. 
Thanks Dr Ruchi and wish you all the best for all your future endeavours.
Regards 
Aishwarya Chauhan
